shortdesc.ph: Callback for remote user or host stopping or resuming audio stream.
Callback when a remote user or host stops or resumes sending audio streams.

p.codeblock: virtual void onUserMuteAudio(uid_t uid, bool muted)
public void onUserMuteAudio(int uid, boolean muted)

section.p: This callback is triggered when the remote user calls to stop or resume sending the audio stream.
This callback is triggered when a remote user calls .
section.note: This callback may not work properly when the number of users in a communication scenario or the number of hosts in a live broadcast scenario exceeds 32.
When the number of users (in communication scenario) or hosts (in live streaming scenario) in the channel exceeds 32, this callback may not work properly.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: This callback is triggered when a remote user calls to stop or resume sending audio streams.

plentry.pd:
Whether the remote user's audio stream is muted:
: The audio stream is muted.
: The audio stream is not muted.

Whether the remote user's audio stream is muted:
: Audio stream is muted.
: Audio stream is not muted.
